## R Markdown

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidymodels)

data <- read.table("data/bodyfat.data")
names(data) <- c("density", "percent_body_fat", "age", "weight", "height",
                 "neck_circumference", "chest_circumference", "abdomen_circumference",
                 "hip_circumference", "thigh_circumference", "knee_circumference",
                 "ankle_circumference", "biceps_circumference", "forearm_circumference",
                 "wrist_circumference")
```

```{r}
data %>%
  pivot_longer(cols = everything(), names_to = "variable", values_to = "value") %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = value)) +
  geom_histogram() +
  facet_wrap(~ variable, scales = "free")
```

### Missingness and collinearity

```{r}
data %>%
  cor() %>%
  corrplot::corrplot()
```
